T02D2527:175a-1: sa manta bha dra n'a ma ho ma lo bi ka /
T02D2527:175b-0: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin @175b sreg gi cho ga //
T02D2527:175b-1: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2527:175b-2: byang chub sems brtan las byung ba //
T02D2527:175b-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2527:175b-4: dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa //
T02D2527:175b-5: sbyin sreg de nyid bdag gis bshad //
T02D2527:175b-6: de nyid rigs pas sbyin sreg la //
T02D2527:175b-7: dgos pa dang po kun byas te //
T02D2527:175b-8: grogs bzang bya ba nges pa dang //
T02D2527:175b-9: phyi nas sbyin sreg rab tu bya //
T02D2527:175b-10: gtsug lag khang dang grong rdal dang //
T02D2527:175b-11: kun dga' grong ngam grong khyer ni //
T02D2527:175b-12: shar dang byang du blta ba ste //
T02D2527:175b-13: lho dang nub tu ma yin no //
T02D2527:175b-14: shis shing sngon ni ston pa yi //
T02D2527:175b-15: sa ni mkhas pas bgrod par bya //
T02D2527:175b-16: yang na yid ni dga' 'gyur ba //
T02D2527:175b-17: gang yin der ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2527:175b-18: dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas su //
T02D2527:175b-19: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bya ste //
T02D2527:175b-20: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2527:175b-21: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la //
T02D2527:175b-22: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D2527:175b-23: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2527:175b-24: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02D2527:175b-25: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D2527:175b-26: rdo rje rin chen sbras par ni //
T02D2527:175b-27: dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo //
T02D2527:175b-28: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
T02D2527:175b-29: sbyin sreg thab ni bri bar bya //
T02D2527:175b-30: kun nas zur ni bzhi pa la //
T02D2527:175b-31: khru gnyes bar ni yongs su bsgrags //
T02D2527:175b-32: zabs su khru gang tsam la ni //
T02D2527:175b-33: kha khyer bzhi ni bskor ba'i //
T02D2527:175b-34: dbus su gtsug tor dgod bya zhing //
T02D2527:175b-35: de yi shar du lhung bzed do //
T02D2527:175b-36: lho phyogs na ni rin chen te //
T02D2527:175b-37: nub kyi phyogs su padma bri //
T02D2527:175b-38: byang du rdo rje h'um mdzad ni //
T02D2527:175b-39: gdug pa thams cad zlog pa'o //
T02D2527:175b-40: mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du //
T02D2527:175b-41: gsang ba'i mchod pa bstan pa dgod //
T02D2527:175b-42: de ltar thab khung nges byas nas //
T02D2527:175b-43: kha khyer la ni 'jug par bya //
T02D2527:175b-44: dang po la ni sems dpa' che //
T02D2527:175b-45: bcu drug nyid du bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2527:175b-46: de yi rgyar ni sor brgyad la//
T02D2527:175b-47: dpangs su sor ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D2527:175b-48: kha khyer gnyis par gyur pa dag / de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad de //
T02D2527:175b-49: dpangs su sor ni brgyad par bshad //
T02D2527:175b-50: de dgongs bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D2527:175b-51: shar phyogs nas brtsams rim bzhin du //
T02D2527:175b-52: padma nags kyi mjug ma dang //
T02D2527:176a-2: aa dze na yi phyag rgya ni //
T02D2527:176a-3: tri sh'u la dang zla ba phyed //
T02D2527:176a-4: ral pa mig dang rgyal mtshan che //
T02D2527:176a-5: mdzes shing bde ba'i phyag rgya che //
T02D2527:176a-6: lho yi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
T02D2527:176a-7: dung dang 'khor lo be con dang //
T02D2527:176a-8: ral gri dang ni de bzhin phub //
T02D2527:176a-9: phag dang seng ge gshibs pa ni //
T02D2527:176a-10: nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya //
T02D2527:176a-11: mdung dang dril bu ba dan dang //
T02D2527:176a-12: rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang //
T02D2527:176a-13: khyim bya lang chos myos pa ni //
T02D2527:176a-14: byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya //
T02D2527:176a-15: kha khyer gsum par gyur ba dag / de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad pa //
T02D2527:176a-16: dpangs su sor ni bcu drug pa ;
T02D2527:176a-17: / sgo glegs dang ni gtan par bcas //
T02D2527:176a-18: de yi phyogs bzhir rta babs dang //
T02D2527:176a-19: bcas pa'i sgo rnams bya ba dang //
T02D2527:176a-20: dra ba dra phyed me long bcas //
T02D2527:176a-21: ba dan la sogs rnams kyis bskor //
T02D2527:176a-22: kha khyer bzhi par bshad pa ni //
T02D2527:176a-23: khor yug lta bur yang dag gnas //
T02D2527:176a-24: rgya ru sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02D2527:176a-25: dbangs su sor ni drug pa'o //
T02D2527:176a-26: de yang rdo rje phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2527:176a-28: 'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog yin zhes //
T02D2527:176a-29: rdo rje can gyis sngon gsungs so //
T02D2527:176a-30: sdig kun 'phrog cing bsod nams dang //
T02D2527:176a-31: dag byed dngos grub thams cad ster //
T02D2527:176a-32: bkra shis pa nyid yin bshad pa //
T02D2527:176a-33: 'di ni thab khung yin par bsgrags //
T02D2527:176a-34: gang yang brgya rtsa bcu pa yis //
T02D2527:176a-35: thab khung bzang po bshad pa rnams //
T02D2527:176a-36: spyi yi thab khung gang yin pa //
T02D2527:176a-37: bye brag can bzhin gnas pa yin //
T02D2527:176a-38: thab khung gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2527:176a-39: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:176a-40: dgang gzar gyi yu ba ni rgyal po'i lag pa'i
T02D2527:176a-41: tshad kyis sor bcu drug kun nas sor bzhi pa
T02D2527:176a-42: / dgang gzar gyi zabs su sor gnyis pa /
T02D2527:176a-44: dbus su rdo rje rtse lngas mtshan pa //
T02D2527:176a-45: yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa ni dgang gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2527:176a-46: blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni khru gang tsam la
T02D2527:176a-47: steng du padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba sor gnyis pa
T02D2527:176a-48: la / dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa ni blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2527:176a-49: khrus dang nye reg la 'bad nas /
T02D2527:176b-0: rtag tu sbyin sreg khang par @176b 'jug / de nas bgegs rnams nyer zhi'i phyir //
T02D2527:176b-1: khro bo'i rgyal po rjes dran bya //
T02D2527:176b-2: de la khro bo'i rgyal po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:176b-3: khro bo ti r'int'i ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:176b-4: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
T02D2527:176b-5: khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:176b-6: rdo rje bcing ba nang du bcings la /
T02D2527:176b-7: mthe bong gnyis po mnyam pas /
T02D2527:176b-8: sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad btsir bar bya ste /
T02D2527:176b-9: 'dis ni bdud la sogs pa bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:176b-10: de nas go cha 'dis phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2527:176b-12: rdo rje zhags pas shar phyogs bcing ngo //
T02D2527:176b-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D2527:176b-14: mthe'u chud gcig la gcig sbrel te /
T02D2527:176b-15: mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar nas rtse mo bzlog ste /
T02D2527:176b-16: spyi gtsug tu gzhag pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2527:176b-17: sngags la aom h'um bandha h'um /
T02D2527:176b-19: rdo rje gtsug tor nyid zlum por byas pa ni
T02D2527:176b-20: rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste sngags la hr'i:badzra
T02D2527:176b-21: p'a sha h'um / de nas rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2527:176b-22: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bya /
T02D2527:176b-23: mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang pa 'di
T02D2527:176b-24: ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya ste sngags
T02D2527:176b-25: la aom badzra pa tangki pa tangki ni ra ta
T02D2527:176b-26: / de nas rdo rje nag pos byang dang 'og dang steng dang mtshams rnams bcings te /
T02D2527:176b-27: rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba bcings la mthe bo brkyang ste /
T02D2527:176b-28: mdzub mo gnyis mche ba 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje nag po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2527:176b-29: sngags la hr'i:badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02D2527:176b-30: de nas rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcings te /
T02D2527:176b-31: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D2527:176b-32: rtse mo ltar steng du gzhag pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2527:176b-33: sngags la aom badzra shi sha re ru ta ma ta /
T02D2527:176b-34: de nas rdo rje spyan gyi sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2527:176b-35: dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar bas bgegs
T02D2527:176b-37: rdo rje bsdams pa byas la /
T02D2527:176b-38: mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste mnyam por gzhag pa ni /
T02D2527:176b-39: rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2527:176b-40: sngags la aom badzra nee tri bandha sarbba bighd'am rdo
T02D2527:176b-41: rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang pa
T02D2527:176b-42: ni rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2527:177a-1: spyi bo nas brtsams te bdag nyid dbang bskur ba
T02D2527:177a-2: byas la dar dbyangs pa'i tshul du bkrol nas mnyam
T02D2527:177a-3: pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2527:177a-4: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D2527:177a-5: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pa snying gar gzhag /
T02D2527:177a-6: rdo rje khu tshur g-yas pa bsor ba'i tshul du
T02D2527:177a-7: gzhag pa ni rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar
T02D2527:177a-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar
T02D2527:177a-10: bas bdud la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad bsregs pa
T02D2527:177a-11: dang 'tshed pa dang thal bar byed pa la sogs
T02D2527:177a-12: pa la khyab par byas te /
T02D2527:177a-13: sngags la aom badzra dzv'a la aa na l'arka h'um /
T02D2527:177a-14: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:177a-15: g-yas nas bskor bas phyogs bcings shing /
T02D2527:177a-16: dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2527:177a-17: kyi steng du rdo rje rab byas na dkyil 'khor
T02D2527:177a-19: de nas sa gzhi bcings bar bya ste /
T02D2527:177a-20: rdo rje bsdams pa kha thur du bstan te sa
T02D2527:177a-21: la bzhag nas sa'i gzhi rnams rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D2527:177a-22: du 'gyur te / rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:177a-23: sngags ni aom badzra dri dho me bh'a ba ra kasha sarbbam sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:177a-24: zhes pa 'dis sa bcings bar bya'o //
T02D2527:177a-25: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' bcings bar bya ste /
T02D2527:177a-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya nyid do //
T02D2527:177a-27: sngags ni aom badzra yaksha h'um /
T02D2527:177a-28: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mig gi phyag rgyas steng bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2527:177a-29: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me bskor
T02D2527:177a-30: ba'i tshul du bskor te mgo bo'i steng du mdzub
T02D2527:177a-31: mo lcags kyu 'dra bar gzhag pa ni rdo rje
T02D2527:177a-32: 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2527:177a-33: sngags ni aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02D2527:177a-34: de nas rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i dra ba bya ste /
T02D2527:177a-35: rdo rje bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2527:177a-37: de nas dogs pa med par gyur par byas nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2527:177a-38: rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o //
T02D2527:177a-39: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa satha n'a ya /
T02D2527:177a-40: a'atma n'am nir+ya ta y'a mi /
T02D2527:177a-41: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2527:177a-42: de nas de bzhin du gnas la rdo rje thal
T02D2527:177b-0: mo snying gar gzhag @177b ste dpral bas phyag bya
T02D2527:177b-1: ste / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza
T02D2527:177b-2: aa bhi she k'a ya a'atma n'am ni rya ta
T02D2527:177b-3: ste / y'a mi / sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2527:177b-4: de nas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag la khas phyag bya'o //
T02D2527:177b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra brtan ya a'atma n'am ni rya ta y'a mi /
T02D2527:177b-6: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma pra barta ya m'am ;
T02D2527:177b-7: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste /
T02D2527:177b-8: snying gar bzhag nas mgos phyag bya ste /
T02D2527:177b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karmma ni a'atma n'am nirya ta y'a mi /
T02D2527:177b-10: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra karmma ku ru m'am /
T02D2527:177b-11: des ni mchod pa bye ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:177b-12: lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la ;
T02D2527:177b-13: pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
T02D2527:177b-14: spyi bo sa la gtugs pa ni phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2527:177b-15: sngags ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya
T02D2527:177b-16: b'a ka tsitta p'a da bandha nam ka ro mi
T02D2527:177b-17: zhes bya'o // bdug spos kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:177b-18: lha'i bdug pa'i mchod pa rnams dran bzhin du sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D2527:177b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pe p'u dza
T02D2527:177b-20: me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2527:177b-21: ye h'um / de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:177b-22: thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog gi sprin rnams spros te /
T02D2527:177b-23: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dza me
T02D2527:177b-24: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2527:177b-25: h'um / de nas mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:177b-26: nyi ma'i snang ba dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2527:177b-27: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u
T02D2527:177b-28: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D2527:177b-29: ma ye h'um / byug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:177b-30: lha la sogs pa'i spos kyi sprin rnams dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2527:177b-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dza me
T02D2527:177b-32: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2527:177b-33: h'um / de nas rin po che'i bye brag la sogs pa rnams dbul te /
T02D2527:177b-34: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta po dhyam ga ratn'a
T02D2527:177b-35: lam k'a ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
T02D2527:177b-36: spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2527:177b-37: de nas rtsed mo'i bde ba thams cad dbul te /
T02D2527:177b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta h'a sya l'a sya
T02D2527:177b-39: kri da ra ti soo khya aa nutta ra p'u
T02D2527:177b-40: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D2527:177b-41: ma ye h'um / de nas gos kyi mchod pa rnams dbul te /
T02D2527:177b-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhy'a lam ka
T02D2527:177b-43: ra bstra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha
T02D2527:177b-44: ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2527:177b-45: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2527:177b-46: sems can thams cad kyi tshangs pa chen po'i gnas
T02D2527:177b-47: bzhi thob par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul
T02D2527:178a-0: te / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsa tur ma h'a @178a * //
T02D2527:178a-1: brahma bi ha ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2527:178a-2: de nas rdo rje bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2527:178a-3: sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems la
T02D2527:178a-4: gnas par gyur cig ces brjod nas de dbul te
T02D2527:178a-5: / aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta bo dhi tsitta
T02D2527:178a-6: p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na
T02D2527:178a-8: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D2527:178a-9: pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de
T02D2527:178a-10: dbul te / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzrod
T02D2527:178a-11: bha b'a d'a na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza
T02D2527:178a-12: me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2527:178a-13: dbul te / ye h'um / sbyin pa'i pha rol
T02D2527:178a-14: tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje sgeg mo'i
T02D2527:178a-15: dbul te / ye h'um / phyag rgya'o // sems
T02D2527:178a-16: can thams cad tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2527:178a-17: pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de
T02D2527:178a-18: dbul te / ye h'um / phyag rgya'o // dbul
T02D2527:178a-19: te / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a
T02D2527:178a-20: bo dha dya har sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a
T02D2527:178a-21: p'u dza ma gha sa mu dra spha ra na
T02D2527:178a-23: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2527:178a-24: sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D2527:178a-25: pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de
T02D2527:178a-26: dbul te / aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dharmma
T02D2527:178a-27: aa ba bo dhi kashan ti p'a ra mi t'a
T02D2527:178a-28: p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na
T02D2527:178a-30: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2527:178a-31: sems can thams cad 'khor ba yangs su spong ba'i
T02D2527:178a-32: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
T02D2527:178a-33: par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te /
T02D2527:178a-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta san s'a r'a p'a
T02D2527:178a-35: ri tyam ka b'i rya p'a ra mi t'a p'u
T02D2527:178a-36: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D2527:178a-37: ma ye h'um / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
T02D2527:178a-38: phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i
T02D2527:178a-39: ma ye h'um / phyag rgya'o // sems can thams
T02D2527:178a-40: cad bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan zhing sems zhi bar
T02D2527:178a-42: bdag gis bsam gtan sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul te /
T02D2527:178a-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta soo khya bi h'a
T02D2527:178a-44: ra dya na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me
T02D2527:178a-45: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2527:178a-46: h'um / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2527:178a-47: phyag rgya ni rdo rje me tog ma'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2527:178a-48: h'um / // sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa
T02D2527:178a-49: dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2527:178a-50: ba rtogs par khong du chud pa dang ldan par
T02D2527:178a-52: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir de dran par bya ste /
T02D2527:178b-0: @178b aom sarba ta th'a ga ta kle shatstshe da
T02D2527:178b-1: sa manta pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me
T02D2527:178b-2: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2527:178b-3: h'um / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2527:178b-4: phyag rgya ni rdo rje bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2527:178b-5: h'um / // bdag nyid 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D2527:178b-6: cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par bsams la btud par
T02D2527:178b-7: h'um / // bya ste / aom sarba ta th'a
T02D2527:178b-8: ga ta k'a ya ni rya ta na p'u dza
T02D2527:178b-9: me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2527:178b-11: rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i
T02D2527:178b-12: lce bsams la bstod pas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2527:178b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka pra brtan
T02D2527:178b-14: p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na
T02D2527:178b-16: bsod nams de rnams bsdus la sems can thams cad la nye bar bsngo bar bya ste /
T02D2527:178b-17: aom sarbba tha th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta
T02D2527:178b-18: na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra
T02D2527:178b-20: mchod pa nyi shu rdzogs so //
T02D2527:178b-21: de ltar mchod pa byas nas dam tshig dang sdom pa blang bar bya ste /
T02D2527:178b-22: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2527:178b-23: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02D2527:178b-24: byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02D2527:178b-25: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2527:178b-26: byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'i //
T02D2527:178b-27: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2527:178b-28: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar bgyi ;
T02D2527:178b-29: / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2527:178b-30: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang /
T02D2527:178b-31: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02D2527:178b-32: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2527:178b-33: de bzhin brtan par gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2527:178b-34: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2527:178b-35: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2527:178b-36: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2527:178b-37: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02D2527:178b-38: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2527:178b-39: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2527:178b-40: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2527:178b-41: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2527:178b-42: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2527:178b-43: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2527:178b-44: nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu //
T02D2527:178b-45: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D2527:178b-46: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02D2527:178b-47: padma'i rigs mchog dam pa la //
T02D2527:178b-48: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D2527:178b-49: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-2: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
T02D2527:179a-3: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-4: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-5: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2527:179a-6: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas ni //
T02D2527:179a-7: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2527:179a-8: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2527:179a-9: ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-10: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-11: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2527:179a-12: sems can mya ngan 'das gzhag bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-14: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis /
T02D2527:179a-15: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni ;
T02D2527:179a-16: / cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang //
T02D2527:179a-17: spho ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi //
T02D2527:179a-18: de la dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:179a-19: zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyi //
T02D2527:179a-20: gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi //
T02D2527:179a-21: mthe bo mthe'u chung so sor bsgreng //
T02D2527:179a-22: sems dpa'i rdo rje rdo rje bsgreng //
T02D2527:179a-23: shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:179a-26: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje zhags pas bskul bar bya ste /
T02D2527:179a-28: nub phyogs kyi sgro rdo rje lcags sgrog rjes su dran par bya ste /
T02D2527:179a-30: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje dril bu brjod par bya ste /
T02D2527:179a-32: rdo rje 'bebs pa rjes su dran pas bskor ba lan gsum bya'o //
T02D2527:179a-33: aom badzra be g'a ku ma h'um /
T02D2527:179a-34: rdo rje sems ma'i snying po ni /
T02D2527:179a-35: sa ma ya satvam aom sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2527:179a-36: snying po 'dis sbyin sreg gi khang par rtag tu 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2527:179a-37: aom sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi h'um /
T02D2527:179a-38: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha sva ba aa /
T02D2527:179a-40: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba sbyar ba byas la ye shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2527:179a-41: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas na bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:179a-42: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa yang ci 'dod par bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2527:179a-44: phyag rgya de snying gar bcings nas /
T02D2527:179a-46: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2527:179a-47: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2527:179a-48: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02D2527:179a-49: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2527:179a-50: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2527:179a-51: hri da ya me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme pra yatsatsha /
T02D2527:179b-0: @179b sarba karmma su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya:ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho:/
T02D2527:179b-1: da nas phreng ba de thab khung du snying po 'dis dor bar bya'o //
T02D2527:179b-2: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra ho:de nas phreng ba de
T02D2527:179b-3: rang gi mgo la snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o
T02D2527:179b-4: // pra t'i grihna sv'a mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la /
T02D2527:179b-5: de nas snying po 'dis rang gi gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2527:179b-6: aom badzra satva sva yam te dhya /
T02D2527:179b-7: tsakshu audgha ta na ta dha ba ra /
T02D2527:179b-8: audgha ta ya te sarbba kosha badzra tsakshur aa nutta
T02D2527:179b-9: ra ma he badzra p'a shya de nas rdo rjes
T02D2527:179b-10: byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i spos chu dang /
T02D2527:179b-11: snying po 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2527:179b-13: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la
T02D2527:179b-14: sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag
T02D2527:179b-16: de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:179b-17: mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol nas ni //
T02D2527:179b-18: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02D2527:179b-19: gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02D2527:179b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2527:179b-21: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
T02D2527:179b-22: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
T02D2527:179b-23: padmo srin lag mthe'u chung gung /
T02D2527:179b-24: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang //
T02D2527:179b-25: de la de rnams kyi rig pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:179b-26: aom badzra dh'a ti shva ri h'um /
T02D2527:179b-31: de nas rang gi rdo rje lag tu bzhag nas /
T02D2527:179b-33: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2527:179b-34: de ring khyod ni bskur bar 'gyur //
T02D2527:179b-35: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2527:179b-36: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2527:179b-37: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam /
T02D2527:179b-38: aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya satvam /
T02D2527:179b-39: de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2527:179b-40: aom badzra satva tvam ma h'a aa bhi shinytsa m'am
T02D2527:179b-41: badzra na ma aa bhi she ka ta he badzra
T02D2527:179b-42: n'a ma / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2527:179b-43: cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar
T02D2527:179b-44: n'a ma / bya'o // 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2527:179b-45: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2527:179b-46: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2527:179b-47: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra y'a mi /
T02D2527:179b-48: badzra satva hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02D2527:179b-49: bdag la byin gyis brlab la sogs //
T02D2527:180a-1: lta bar ni bka' nod do //
T02D2527:180a-2: de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod //
T02D2527:180a-3: de nas rdo rje bsgrub par bgyi //
T02D2527:180a-4: zhes gang gsungs pa de slar yang bshad pa de dag yin no //
T02D2527:180a-5: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02D2527:180a-6: rdo rje lcags rgyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2527:180a-7: se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
T02D2527:180a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02D2527:180a-10: snying po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na /
T02D2527:180a-11: des sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2527:180a-12: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par 'gyur na /
T02D2527:180a-13: gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D2527:180a-14: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D2527:180a-15: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2527:180a-16: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2527:180a-17: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02D2527:180a-18: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02D2527:180a-19: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02D2527:180a-20: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yin //
T02D2527:180a-21: dam tshig rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2527:180a-22: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2527:180a-23: sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2527:180a-24: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02D2527:180a-27: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
T02D2527:180a-28: sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar //
T02D2527:180a-29: spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug / bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2527:180a-30: de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T02D2527:180a-31: gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la //
T02D2527:180a-32: thams cad don kun 'grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2527:180a-33: thams cad mdzod ces gsol ba bgyi //
T02D2527:180a-34: de nas sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad rdo
T02D2527:180a-35: rje'i rtse mo'i sngags kyis bsangs la g-yas phyogs su
T02D2527:180a-36: gzhag go // mchod yon gyi snod ni g-yon du bzhag nas /
T02D2527:180a-37: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2527:180a-38: pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2527:180a-39: kyi gsang sngags ni 'dis dgang blugs gsum dbul lo
T02D2527:180a-41: pra d'ipta a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2527:180a-42: ma h'a sa ma ya badzra h'um dza:de nas zhi
T02D2527:180a-44: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thab kyi dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02D2527:180a-45: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2527:180b-0: til gyi sreg blugs @180b dbul lo //
T02D2527:180b-1: yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me //
T02D2527:180b-2: rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02D2527:180b-3: mnyam par gzhag par snyoms zhugs par //
T02D2527:180b-4: til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing //
T02D2527:180b-6: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:180b-7: khyim rgyas par 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la /
T02D2527:180b-8: mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02D2527:180b-9: yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni //
T02D2527:180b-10: me ni rab tu spar nas kyang //
T02D2527:180b-11: rtag tu 'bras ni sreg byas na //
T02D2527:180b-12: gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur //
T02D2527:180b-14: aom badzra pusht'a ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:180b-15: de nas te ring bar 'dod pas /
T02D2527:180b-16: bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa thab kyi dbus su bsams la /
T02D2527:180b-17: mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02D2527:180b-18: yam shing dmar po rnams kyis kyang //
T02D2527:180b-19: mkhas pas rtag tu me sbar te ;
T02D2527:180b-20: d'ur ba'i myu gu mar bcas pas //
T02D2527:180b-23: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:180b-24: de nas bdag gam gzhan rnams bsrung bar 'dod pas /
T02D2527:180b-25: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la /
T02D2527:180b-26: til mar gyi dgangs blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02D2527:180b-27: yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni //
T02D2527:180b-28: me ni rab tu spar byas la //
T02D2527:180b-29: ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis //
T02D2527:180b-30: sbyin sreg byas na nges par bsrung /
T02D2527:180b-32: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:180b-33: de nas rang gi lha thab kyi dbus su bsams
T02D2527:180b-34: la til dang 'bras dang mar dang d'ur ba dang
T02D2527:180b-35: til mar dang / ku sha'i myu gu la sogs pa dbul ba dang /
T02D2527:180b-36: dgang blugs dang po dang rdzogs khar dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2527:180b-37: zhi ba phal cher srod la bya'o //
T02D2527:180b-38: rgyas pa snga dro bya ba yin //
T02D2527:180b-39: mngon spyod nyi ma gung la ste /
T02D2527:180b-40: sgrub pa pos ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D2527:180b-41: zhi la kha dog dkar po ste //
T02D2527:180b-42: rgyas la ser por snang ba yin //
T02D2527:180b-43: rjes su chags la kha dog dmar //
T02D2527:180b-44: mngon spyod la ni sngo dang gnag / de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te /
T02D2527:180b-45: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dgu dang //
T02D2527:181a-3: las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcang //
T02D2527:181a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang //
T02D2527:181a-5: d'ur ba dang dri'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te de rnam par mthong nas /
T02D2527:181a-6: dgang blugs phul la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2527:181a-7: sbyin sreg gi lha rnams tshim par byas nas bya
T02D2527:181a-8: ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan
T02D2527:181a-9: 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2527:181a-10: de bas na nus pa med pas kyang ci nus pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2527:181a-11: nus pa med pa'i phyir brjod par bya ste /
T02D2527:181a-12: rang gi khang pa'i byang shar gyi phyogs su thab khung zur bzhi'am /
T02D2527:181a-13: zlum por khru gang tsam la zabs su mtho gang
T02D2527:181a-14: tsam brkos te thab kyi dbus su rdo rje rtse
T02D2527:181a-15: lnga pa sor brgyad pa'i tshad la dpangs su sor
T02D2527:181a-16: bzhi pa bzhag thab kyi ngos la dpangs su sor
T02D2527:181a-17: bzhi pa'i grva bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bya'o //
T02D2527:181a-18: de la phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:181a-19: thal mo dam du sbyar ba las //
T02D2527:181a-20: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02D2527:181a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2527:181a-22: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2527:181a-23: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2527:181a-24: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rim pa rnams nye
T02D2527:181a-25: bar bstan te / rdo rje bcing bas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ngo /
T02D2527:181a-26: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas /
T02D2527:181a-27: rab tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste snying gar dgrol lo //
T02D2527:181a-29: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcings la rang la
T02D2527:181a-30: byin gyis brlab pa nas ji srid rdo rje rjes
T02D2527:181a-31: su dran pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa bsgrub
T02D2527:181a-32: pa'i bye brag rnams rang gi lus dang ngag yid
T02D2527:181a-33: rdo rje la dgug pa dang /
T02D2527:181a-37: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D2527:181a-38: aa rdo rje khu tshur gyis mdzub mo sbyar ba
T02D2527:181a-39: ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
T02D2527:181a-40: // de nas zhugs nas rang la byin gyis brlab
T02D2527:181a-41: pa nas ji srid sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis mdza'
T02D2527:181a-42: bo nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:181a-43: de nas dam tshig chen bo'i sems dpa' rjes su dran la /
T02D2527:181a-45: sa ma ya sa tva ham /
T02D2527:181a-46: 'dis ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i rdo
T02D2527:181b-0: rje'i @181b phyag rgyas dam tshig chen bo'i sems dpa'
T02D2527:181b-1: dang gcig tu gyur pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:181b-2: phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02D2527:181b-3: de nas thun mong gi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:181b-4: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sems dpa' chen po de
T02D2527:181b-5: nyid rang gi lus la brten cing zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2527:181b-7: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i sku bdag nyid du snying bo 'dis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2527:181b-9: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag nyid
T02D2527:181b-10: rnam par bsams la sngags 'dis der byin gyis brlab
T02D2527:181b-11: par bya'o // sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2527:181b-12: de nas rang gi lha snga ma bzhin du thab
T02D2527:181b-13: kyi dbus su bsams la sbyin sreg ji lta ba
T02D2527:181b-15: mchod nas snying bo 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2527:181b-16: badzra mu:de nas rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i
T02D2527:181b-17: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang
T02D2527:181b-18: bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur la mdzub
T02D2527:181b-19: mo gnyis kyi phreng ba bcings shing de bzhin du
T02D2527:181b-21: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa sarbba mu dra mee
T02D2527:181b-22: tri dhi ku ru ba ra ka pa tse na
T02D2527:181b-23: bam / rin chen sems ma'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:181b-24: rin chen rdo rje las mthe bo mnyam ste mdzub mo bkug pa dang rtse sbyar ba'o //
T02D2527:181b-25: de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba
T02D2527:181b-26: de bkrol la snying po 'di dang mnyam pa'i thal
T02D2527:181b-29: go cha 'dis phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
T02D2527:181b-30: dbang bskur ba bcing zhing mnyes par bya ba'am /
T02D2527:181b-31: rdo rje sems dpas kyang rdo rje nyid du nye bar dgrol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2527:181b-32: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod la /
T02D2527:181b-33: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //
T02D2527:181b-34: rdo rje 'gying pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2527:181b-35: bsam pa g-yos pas gdung bar bya //
T02D2527:181b-36: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas byung //
T02D2527:181b-37: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
T02D2527:181b-38: rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis //
T02D2527:181b-39: spos la sogs pa de bzhin dbul //
T02D2527:181b-40: thur du blugs dang gyen du gtor //
T02D2527:181b-41: bskor dang de bzhin byug pa'o //
T02D2527:182a-0: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu ni 'di @182a * //
T02D2527:182a-2: aom badzra satva su sam gra ham /
T02D2527:182a-6: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di dang glu blangs la /
T02D2527:182a-7: lag ba'i rtse mos gar byas nas //
T02D2527:182a-9: rab dang 'bad pas khrus byas te //
T02D2527:182a-10: rtag tu sbyin sreg khang bar zhugs //
T02D2527:182a-11: zhes ji skad du bshad pa de ma smras so zhe na /
T02D2527:182a-13: rnam rtog khrus kyi sbyor ba 'di //
T02D2527:182a-14: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bshad pa //
T02D2527:182a-15: de ni rnam rtog tsam yin pas //
T02D2527:182a-16: de la blo ni 'jug mi bya //
T02D2527:182a-17: de bas sngags dang phyag rgya yis //
T02D2527:182a-18: legs byas khrus ni bshad par bya //
T02D2527:182a-19: rnam rtog la ni spyod bzhin du //
T02D2527:182a-20: gang gi bgegs ni mi 'jug pa'o //
T02D2527:182a-21: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2527:182a-22: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D2527:182a-24: aom ku pi ku pi k'a ya ku pi pra dzva la ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:182a-26: dang po'i yi ge'i go chas go bgo ste rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2527:182a-27: snying gar mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud pa byas la
T02D2527:182a-28: rgyab tu drangs te mdud pa bya slar yang snying
T02D2527:182a-29: gar drangs te mdud pa bya /
T02D2527:182a-30: de bzhin du lkog ma'i steng du mdud pa bya ba dang /
T02D2527:182a-31: dpral bar mdud pa bya ba dang ltag par mdud pa byas nas /
T02D2527:182a-32: rna ba gnyis kyi gong du mtha' nas dgrol bas dar dpyangs bya ste /
T02D2527:182a-33: mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2527:182a-34: de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2527:182a-35: aom tum rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdug pa thams cad bza' bar bya zhing /
T02D2527:182a-36: mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2527:182a-38: h'um de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags brjod de /
T02D2527:182a-39: aa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2527:182a-40: de nas gsang sngags 'dis chu snyim pa gsum gyen du gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2527:182a-41: aom bhur dzva la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2527:182a-42: rig sngags 'dis cha gsum du bya ste /
T02D2527:182a-43: gcig gis ni dge ba'i gtsang sbra bya'o //
T02D2527:182a-44: gnyis pas lus kyi gtsang sbra bya'o //
T02D2527:182a-45: gsum pas ni khrus dang nye reg bya zhing /
T02D2527:182b-0: rang gi mgor rang gi gsang sngags dang phyag @182b rgyas chu gtor na /
T02D2527:182b-1: rang gi rnam par rtog pa las skyes pa'i bgegs mi 'byung ste /
T02D2527:182b-2: sems can 'tshe ba'am sdig pa dag khyed la med
T02D2527:182b-3: kyi ma 'jigs shig / rig pa las byung dge
T02D2527:182b-4: ba bzhin // bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung //
T02D2527:182b-5: khrus byas nas ni sbyin sreg gi //
T02D2527:182b-6: cho ga thams cad spyad par bya'o //
T02D2527:182b-7: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2527:182b-8: snying po 'dis gyen du dgrol lo //
T02D2527:182b-9: aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02D2527:182b-10: dngos grub ji bzhin gsol lags kyis //
T02D2527:182b-11: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol /
T02D2527:182b-13: de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po rjes su dran la /
T02D2527:182b-14: ci bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D2527:182b-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i ming tsam zhig / lan cig yongs su gzung bas kyang //
T02D2527:182b-16: 'di ni bsrung ba dam pa ste //
T02D2527:182b-17: mi zad rtag pa'i dngos grub ster //
T02D2527:182b-18: mkhas pa ngang pa'i rgyal pos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ;
T02D2527:182b-19: /'dir ni sbyin sreg cho ga bris pas dge ba gang bsags pa /
T02D2527:182b-20: des ni srid gsum tsher ma 'byin cing zhi bzhi rtog ldan pa /
T02D2527:182b-21: rgyal ba lnga yi cod pan 'dzin dang 'gro ba
T02D2527:182b-22: rjes su mnyam par shog / kun du bzang po
